scripts.prod-client: wait-on http://localhost:9000 && cd client && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.prod-server: cd server && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.dev-client: wait-on http://localhost:9000 && cd client && yarn dev
scripts.lint: cd client && yarn lint && cd ../server && yarn lint && cd ../shared && yarn lint
scripts.clean-deps: rimraf ./node_modules && rimraf client/node_modules && rimraf server/node_modules && rimraf shared/node_modules
